content.html: Nat, no. 1) this feature is no “great new thing. Let’s not pretend it is 2) there’s a huge difference between working hard because you’re personally motivated by the mission vs a culture of fear 3) you know how many people do their best work when they’re burnt out? None.
content.value:
Nat, no.

1) this feature is no “great new thing. Let’s not pretend it is

2) there’s a huge difference between working hard because you’re personally motivated by the mission vs a culture of fear

3) you know how many people do their best work when they’re burnt out? None.
